msbt.message: Hey there! Awesome to meet you. My name's . What about you? Where you from?, eh? And you're from ? Cool name from a strong-sounding place.Sohave you ever gone on a solo kayak tour that suddenly turned into a super-exciting SURVIVAL tour?'Cause I have! And it's so much fun out here, !

Wilderness training is just the best, isn't it? I'm . What's your name?, huh? Great to meet you, . You're not from are you?You are! I didn't know it was real. I heard the best abs on the planet come from there, !

Are you here for survival training too? My name's . What's yours?, huh? And from ? Alright, it's cool to meet you!Well, I'm gonna get back to surviving. Let me know if you need help lifting a tree or something, .

You know, as much as I wanna stay here and train, I can only build so much muscle by gathering stuff.What would be REALLY cool is if I could live near someone that inspires me to go big on bulking up.Someone like you! Your triceps are justastonishing, !
I appreciate it. I'm just amazed I got to see such glorious triceps all the way out here. Take good care of 'em!

Train with you? AND your glorious triceps? I can't turn that down. , here I come!Just you wait. We're totally gonna push each other to muscular new weights, !We'll be sworn rivals of swole-dom, AND best buds in buff-ness. It's gonna be mega-epic. Just like us!
It'll be a blast. You ever seen 30-pack abs? Neither have I. But we're gonna, !Alright, I just gotta bug Tom Nook to put the ball in play. Thanks for the first-round draft pick!

I'm out here to work on my hand-to-handiness.That means doing all my fishing, bug catching, and stuff gathering with only my bare hands. So far I've tripled my personal best! I have six sticks and a fistful of weeds, .
The terrain here is absolutely perfect for distance training.I'd take the island home with me if I could, but my arms are already kinda tired for the day, .

Catching fish or bugs or chopping down trees barehanded is tough. WAY tougher than I expected!But I came out here to go back to nature, and nature doesn't use tools, .However, if nature DID use tools, I'd go talk to Wilbur for some because my hands REALLY hurt!
I can't wait to start working out in my new home. I'm gonna lift EVERYTHING, !
You know muscles can talk to each other over great distances, right? I read that somewhere, .What I'm getting at is I bet that's how we found each other. Our muscles were fated to meet!
You ever go out for your morning triple-marathon and you just know something cool's gonna happen?Today's was like that, !
